name: Homebound (itch) (Red Bean)
description:
“We’re under attack!” 

As you force your eyes open, star showers of scarlet flame streak your periphery, blindingly bright. The night sky bursts ablaze - the skyline of alluring lilac has been dyed a terrible crimson. Psychedelic vertigo fills you as you whiz past the iridescent nebula in your spacecraft, eventually arriving at a sprawling metropolis filled with “aliens” who look just like you.  By stealing Gaia's Core Crystal, they have removed the glowing moonlight from your sky, without which you can no longer hope to dream.  Your mission is simple: recover what's yours, and return home!

WASD keys to navigate, Space Bar to shoot!
